title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: Embark on an epic adventure in the kingdom of Hyrule.

title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
description: Create your own virtual paradise on a deserted island.

title: Super Mario Odyssey
description: Join Mario on a globe-trotting journey to rescue Princess Peach.

title: Pokémon Sword
description: Embark on a new Pokémon adventure in the Galar region.

title: Splatoon 2
description: Engage in ink-splatting battles in this colorful team-based shooter.

title: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
description: Race against your friends in the ultimate kart racing game.

title: Fire Emblem: Three Houses
description: Experience a tactical role-playing game set in a fantasy world.

title: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
description: Fight with an all-star cast of Nintendo characters in intense battles.

title: Luigi's Mansion 3
description: Join Luigi in a haunted hotel adventure to rescue his friends.

title: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity
description: Experience the events leading up to the Great Calamity in Hyrule.
